blacksmith.description: You are at the blacksmith's shop. You can go to the village.

village.description: You are in the village center. You see villagers around. You can go to the blacksmith, the well, or talk to villagers.

conditions.waterWheelFixed: The villagers are happy and greet you warmly.

well.description: You are by the well. You can go down the well using the bucket, or return to the village.

bottomOfWell.description: You are at the bottom of the well. It's dark but you find a missing piece of the water wheel alternator here. You can go back up using the bucket.

messages.villagersNeutral: The villagers are busy and seem indifferent to you.
messages.villagersFriendly: The villagers thank you for fixing the water wheel. They are now friendly towards you.
messages.wheelFixed: You use the alternator piece to fix the water wheel. The wheel starts turning, and water flows again.
